fi.jumi.api.drivers

Interface TestNotifier


  • public interface TestNotifier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireFailure(Throwable cause)
      May be called multiple times per test (although most testing frameworks will stop execution on the first exception).
      void fireTestFinished()
      Must be called last, exactly once.

    • Method Detail

      • fireFailure

        void fireFailure(Throwable cause)
        May be called multiple times per test (although most testing frameworks will stop execution on the first exception).

      • fireTestFinished

        void fireTestFinished()
        Must be called last, exactly once. The test will fail if fireFailure(java.lang.Throwable) had been called at least once, otherwise the test will pass. It is a runtime error to call fireFailure(java.lang.Throwable) or fireTestFinished() after calling this method.
